text: Pairat maaŋ nzuaim, mba gumgi gu mbigi, mbe khaŋ tɨgav nzuav khaŋ nzuai, “Kha guma, ana za kha Zudia fhaiŋ ga ruigi. Ana fhara Gariri fhain kegap, khavgiap, za kha bigi ga rua zav, nza ŋgun hɨgi. Ana maaŋ mbua ruav, bunin nza gumgi gu mbigi khɨvav mbe nzuav, mbe ndavi khavim, mbe ana zɨn vui.”
